channel.title: Readings on Predictive Analytics
channel.description: Recent content in Readings on Predictive Analytics

item.title: Agent-based modelling for predictive analytics
item.description: An additional, extended reading list from this link. ABM primers Brunsdon, C. and Singleton, A. (2016)Chris Brunsdon and Alex Singleton, Geocomputation: A Practical Primer (Heidelberg, Germany: Springer-Verlag, 2015), https://uk.sagepub.com/en-gb/eur/geocomputation/book241023. Geocomputation: A practical primer. Crooks, A., Malleson, N., Manley, E. and Hepppenstall, Al. (2018)Andrew Crooks et al., Agent-Based Modelling and Geographical Information Systems: A Practical Primer (London, UK: Safe, 2018), https://uk.sagepub.com/en-gb/eur/agent-based-modelling-and-geographical-information-systems/book250134. Agent-Based Modelling and Geographical Information Systems: a practical primer.

item.title: Machine learning for predictive analytics
item.description: ML primers Gareth James, Daniela Witten, Trevor Hastie and Robert Tibshirani’Gareth James et al., An Introduction to Statistical Learning: With Applications in r (Springer Publishing Company, Incorporated, 2014). s An introduction to statistical learning provides a conceptual and practical introduction in R to key ML techniques. Max Kuhn and Julia SilgeMax Kuhn and Julia Silge, Tidy Modeling with r, 2022. Tidy modeling with R demonstrates how to deploy tidyverse workflows when working over ML (resampled) model outputs.

item.title: Simulating behaviours for predictive analytics
item.description: Data science, predictive analytics Birkin, M. (2018)[@birkin_spatial_2018] "Spatial data analytics of mobility with consumer data". - Lovelace, R. et al. (2016)[@lovelace_from_2016] "From Big Noise to Big Data: Toward the Verification of Large Data sets for Understanding Regional Retail Flows". -- Arribas-Bel, D. & Reades, J. (2018)Dani Arribas-Bel and Jon Reades, “Geography and Computers: Past, Present, and Future,” Geography Compass 12, no. 10 (2018): e12403, doi:10.

item.title: Targeted marketing for predictive analytics
item.description: Recommender systems Linden, G. et al.Greg Linden, Brent Smith, and Jeremy York, “Amazon.com Recommendations: Item-to-Item Collaborative Filtering,” IEEE Internet Computing 7, no. 1 (January 2003): 76–80, doi:10.1109/MIC.2003.1167344. “Amazon.com Recommendations: Item-to-Item Collaborative Filtering”. Microtargetting Konsinski, M.Michal Kosinski, David Stillwell, and Thore Graepel, “Private Traits and Attributes Are Predictable from Digital Records of Human Behavior,” Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences 110, no. 15 (2013): 5802–5, doi:10.
